export const OurServices = (props) => { return (

{props.data ? props.data.data.titleOurServices : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.paragraphOurServices : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.ourServices.map((d, i) => (

{d.title}

{d.text}

)) : 'Loading...'}
) }
